hallelujah
Shalom everybody I'm here in Seattle I
got the Seattle's safe and sound I had a

that have joined my prayer zoom room
meeting back in January Candice and
Jeanne and also another subscriber who's
been a subscriber for about a year and
she lives in Seattle she also joined us
for dinner her name's Cynthia and we had
a wonderful wonderful meal together
about an hour after I arrived in Seattle
earlier this evening and just a lot of
great fellowship and then afterward we
all went outside the hotel and we prayed
and we prayed for Candice she's been
dealing with some health issues and
weekend the Holy Spirit just I mean just
fell so powerfully I just felt this
presence so powerfully and Candice after
we stopped stopped praying for her she
had testified that she felt like this
crooked rod had gone straight and her
countenance was just glowing it was it
was so edifying and then everybody
prayed for me and for my next leg of my
journey because tomorrow I leave for
Seattle and I head to DC and I'll get to
DC late tomorrow night so it's just a
wonderful time in prayer so they prayed
for me and and then we also prayed for
President Trump so we just had our
little mini prayer meeting the four of
us right outside the hotel and it was it
was really wonderful
Cynthia was a really interesting woman
she actually if you are familiar with
Keith green I've talked about Keith
green before I think he's one of my

that lived back in the 70s he totally
loved Jesus Yahshua with everything in
him he was sold out to to Christ he he
never charged for his music it was all
voluntary donations and and yah blessed
and mightily unfortunately he was killed
in a plane accident when he was only 28
back in 1982 but during the brief time
that he was here and when he was doing
his ministry
heeey this was back in the 70s he had
this last day's newsletter where he was
exposing the Catholic Church and showing
the the evils way back then at the
Catholic Church before a lot of people
even knew about what was going on so
just an amazing man well Cynthia she
actually lived with Keith and melody
back in the 70s when they had their

you'll find a lot of his music it's very
anointing you just he loved y'all with
everything in him and I highly recommend
his book no compromise I have a kindred
spirit with Keith green because he was a
very prophetic black-and-white just in
your face all or nothing for Christ and
yet he had a profound love for you and
for people so anyway
Cynthia actually knew Keith and melody
she stayed with them in their home and
helped with their ministry and it was
just a real joy to meet her
so so it was just it was a blessing all

that cool
anyway I think it's cool so I'm looking

I'll be there for the 4th of July and

junot by friday evening so before

it's been wonderful a very blessed trip
